website_summaries.verdict: A large, high-quality mirror that exudes elegance.
pros: Ample size works well for almost any height
Users praise its quality and sophisticated style
We love that it's both sturdy and attractive
cons: Minor consumer issues with the construction of the frame and messy packing material

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror...good looking mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. It is large but fits so well in a corner of a bedroom. My daughter liked it so much, that I bought one for her home as well
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta D. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is so pretty and tall. So glad I decided on this one. It matches my bedroom colors perfectly. It is a little on the heavy side so its kinda hard to move around but its still doable. You can adjust how tilted you want it, and it can be anchored to the wall if you're nervous it might fall over. I don't anchor mine because I often move it around and it has never fallen over. With the wood boarder: about 72" tall and 28" wide. Without boarder: about 64" tall and 20" wide. It arrived in perfect condition and does not disappoint. I highly recommend this mirror. ***If helpful, please click 'Helpful'*** :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was not made well. I feel like for the cost it was awful. When we unpacked it, the back and mirror came off because the staples didn't line up with the wood. I went to return it but then amazon said I had to take it back to a post office- well its huge and heavy and I don't have a vehicle that can hold it. SO my dad came over and nailed the backing back on all the way around the mirror.....this worked but the frame is loose also so Im wondering how long it's going to last. Poorly made and wont recommend this mirror to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: d1kl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror - IMPORTANT - shipped by AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror I surprised my wife with. I did a LOT of research and found out that if you buy a mirror and it's not sold and shipped by Amazon that you may be liable for the cost of return shipping and a restocking fee, even if it arrives broken! That fact alone narrowed my choices greatly. I definitely am glad that I went with this one. It was packed very sufficiently and I didn't have the styrofoam breaking into a million pieces and going everywhere as one reviewer mentioned. Worked out great - I'd highly recommend this mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Scoots Mason

customer_reviews.title: but the company was incredibly nice and helpful in sending me a replacement
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got broke in the mail, but the company was incredibly nice and helpful in sending me a replacement. They just sent a new one out - I believe for safety reasons they don't have you mail back the broken one. Second one came in one piece. I've since had this in three different homes, its pretty easy to move. Just be careful when setting up as there are little straps that hold the back leaning piece in place - they're adjustable so you can change how much the mirror leans, but if not secured the straps come off the hooks easily. I love how tall this mirror is - especially since I am 5'11".
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: great mirror! 1st one that came was broke and ...
customer_reviews.text: great mirror ! 1st one that came was broke and they sent out another one and i love it ! Very Sturdy I agree with another review perfect for Divas
customer_reviews.author: Darlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love It!  Would recommend it to family and friends...
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality! I love that it has the stand so it doesn't have to touch my walls... very rich in color, and the image is sharp - not contorted like cheap mirrors. HUGE bonus, is that my husband is 6'4", and can see himself head-toe with room to spare! All other mirrors have never been able to accommodate his size.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Jo

customer_reviews.title: This is one gorgeous piece of decor.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was exactly as it showed,stunning and came in a timely manner and was packed with extra packing as I had asked for.would definitely recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: akasha

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror. The color looks more black than brown but still goes well in my bedroom. It arrived early and was package well so no breakage. There was a small brown defect embedded in the mirror it self. Seller was very good and offered replacing mirror or price adjustment. I requested a certain amount and they agreed to it minus three dollars. I didn't want to go through the hassle but couldn't understand why not the three dollars. That's the reason for the four stars instead of the five. Overall it's a nice mirror. Sturdy and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: BajanT

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, Ships Terribly
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to buy this item twice and both times it arrived broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jon F

customer_reviews.title: Great look, light packaging
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Minimal look with an amazing dark frame - Perfect size for all heights (I'm 6'0") - Stand is very sturdy. Mirror itself is heavy, doesn't feel like it will fall over - Delivery was quick Cons: - Packaging seems light for such a heavy fragile item - My frame was cracked right out of the box - Wish the stand came unattached, or optional
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more and get better quality product
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is loose from the boarders, the boarders are damaged (but the packaging is intact). Spend a little more and get better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: flygrl

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Worth every single penny. I even paid the 29.99 for shipping rather than amazon priming it so I could get it sooner. Worth it. Love it! Packaged well and super easy to set up. Comes with materials to strap it to your wall, but I don't have small kids so I didn't do that. Very sturdy. I'm using it for a yoga room in my house.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN LAWRENCE

customer_reviews.title: Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Only had this mirror a couple months and noticed the backing pulling off the frame. The staples that hold the mirror to the wood frame are not deep enough into the wood to hold it together. It’s looks good in my bedroom but if I rearrange my room and move the mirror it will probably fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: kim crestani

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in any room
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous mirror. Looks great in any room. Great quality. Has different adjustment options so you can lean it back without worrying about it falling. Would purchase again. Great for getting dressed in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: The mirror looks nice but the quality is not good
customer_reviews.text: The mirror looks nice but the quality is not good. There are two metal hooks on the backing stand that attach to straps so that you can adjust the angle of the mirror. One of the hooks was bent sideways and broke off when we tried to adjust the strap. This leaves us with only one strap holding the stand in place and it does not feel secure. Photo is of the side of the mirror (where the strap is) and the broken hook. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is beautiful. However, I was buying it to go in a guest room. I needed a leaner that wasn't too large with a dark wood frame. After I bought this, I saw that Target had something very similar (a little smaller) for $60...womp womp!! It's okay though, I still like this mirror. It is nice quality and would recommend it, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Getting Healthy

customer_reviews.title: No distortion, looks as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in the condition expected. There's a lot of packaging to dispose of, but otherwise no issues. The frame and mirror we in tact. The mirror is distortion-free. Overall it looks nice in my house.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! It looks as good as the ones I've seen that cost hundreds more! It arrived very well packaged and in perfect condition. A warning for those who live alone: It's heavy! And, yes, it is very well made!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Omg I am SOOOOO happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Omg I am SOOOOO happy with this purchase!! I was so nervous buying this because I had been looking for a large standing mirror but this mirror is perfect. Its huge its clean its modern its everything I was looking for. I highly recommend this. Mine came all in one piece. The hardest part was carrying it up the stairs haha
customer_reviews.author: Nayab

customer_reviews.title: I do love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: I do love this mirror. It's a lot bigger than I expected (I didn't pay attention to the dimensions). Feels very sturdy and looks more expensive that it was. The bottom left corner was slightly damaged. You can't see it while it's on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lisaq

customer_reviews.title: amazing!!!! But this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror. It was packaged very well and brought right to my door. No scratches beautiful finish. Looks great in my bedroom. I would definitely recommend this to everyone else
customer_reviews.author: Tia M.

customer_reviews.title: Good miror.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is GORGEOUS and I love how wide it is. I wanted a mirror that showed my entire person, outfit, etc. and good for selfies. This does the trick and is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent inexpensive mirror
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive full length mirror to have in the bedroom for the lady of the house, and I stumbled across this mirror. My apprehension ordering this online was the quality of the mirror and shipping, but all the great reviews convinced me it was worth the risk. I'm glad I went for it, because this is a great item. The mirror is not warped in any way, and the super dark brown works perfect with my bedroom furniture of the same color. The angle is perfect when standing about 5 feet away, and the height makes it a great piece of art in the bedroom without being too obtrusive. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mogg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I LOVE this mirror!!!! We have been looking for one and this was both the right size and a great price. The mirror is well made, looks stylish, and is sturdy - does not slip back at all. Shipping is fantastic and it is easy to set-up. A terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! It’s a great full length mirror. It’s heavy so it’s on my first floor. Arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: this mirror fits beautiful in the corner of my master bedroom
customer_reviews.text: this mirror fits beautiful in the corner of my master bedroom. adjusts on the sides to lower mirror to desired reflection point.
customer_reviews.author: PR Princess

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting a tall Ikea Mirror similar to this for a while but since moving and not being as near to Ikea anymore, we picked this up from Amazon. Next Day delivery and everything was already put together. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Reni

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead. Buy it.  You will not regret
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror. It’s huge... shipped fast no problems packed well. I love it . Go ahead and buy. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Twotone

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!  Great value
customer_reviews.text: This mirror looks great! A great value that looks amazing in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sprinkel27

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is so heavy and very well-made. I should have read the dimensions a bit more carefully, as it is huge! Does not fit where I originally intended to put it, but worked out better in another spot anyway.
customer_reviews.author: dee0107

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived with no scratches or breaks, very easy ro set up, if you have kids no fear it comes with tools to anchor the mirror to the wall as i have done since i have a 1 year old. I am extremely pleased ! The mirror is also perfect for my height of 5’1” !!
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Christie

customer_reviews.title: Received as a damaged item
customer_reviews.text: Received the package intact but was found damaged when opened. One upper corner was damaged, chipped off from both sides. The mirror stapled to the frame is detached from and gaping out about3/4 of one side. Very unhappy with the quality check of the product. This shows a poor workmanship
customer_reviews.author: sarala s.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this mirror! I did need to put different screws in the back to secure the stand better, but overall I am very glad that I made this purchase. I purchased it for exercise (ballet, weight lifting) to check my form and it works great. It came packaged so well that it took a while to unwrap. Prompt shipping. Overall excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: dustbunny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy! I've wanted an over-sized mirror all my life, and this one looks so classy and makes my small room look larger.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing! I didn't expect it to be this good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rumi

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice. Order now.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! no damage from shipping, looks great, zero assembly, (we're renting so we didn't attach it to the wall).. Gorgeous espresso finish, heavy-quality feel... May order more! (wish there were more colors available)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We got the mirror and it is just beautiful! The worst part was getting it out of the packaging!!! But, glad they packaged it the way they did, because there are no scratches or dings and the mirrow showed up perfect! I would buy it again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corina Moore

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, sturdy, able to move with out much trouble very elegant piece
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: It’s awsome get it worth the price kinda hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s awsome get it worth the price kinda hard to get out of the box but it is still nice
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Such great value for the money!!! I would buy this again! I love the size and how big it is!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Burmeister

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. Its size makes it a bold statement in any room.
customer_reviews.author: Will Burks

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror so much. Funny story, I went to the store a few days after it arrived and saw mirrors similar to it for $39 :)
customer_reviews.author: Harley M

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect mirror that I have been looking for a while
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect mirror that I have been looking for a while. It looks exactly like the picture. It fits perfectly in my living room. It was packed very well. it arrives no scratch and fast. I am very happy with my purchase, good price, good quality and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: amy huang

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Lovely mirror but unfortunately mine came damaged. It was the last one and i it was pretty pricey! I wouldn’t blame the company the shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: danee page

customer_reviews.title: The frame is very nice. Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my Dad and he loves it. The glass is clear and slimming. It arrived as scheduled and with no damage. The frame is very nice. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boxed up amazingly secure! It ain't light! Looks a lot more expensive than it is!
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror. Clear, taller than I am, easy to set up, well packaged. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Little Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent delivery, nice and secure
customer_reviews.text: Excellent delivery, nice and secure. The backing on the mirror itself is kinda coming off in some places. But hopefully I can fix it with a hammer to push it back into place. Otherwise really large and great! Exactly what I needed. Doesn't take up too much room
customer_reviews.author: Thelma

customer_reviews.title: Separation Anxiety.
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 weeks of standing in the corner of my room, the mirror has detached from the frame. It is too big to return (and I no longer have the packing materials) so I guess I am stuck with it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: unsatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely disappointed in the product
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars. Entire glass was cracked, despite normal packaging. Absolutely disappointed in the product
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in person. No assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. We are using using it in our garage gym and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: They can't ship mirrors without breaking ! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This arrived completely broken Even the frame was broken Now I have to package broken glass and clean glass off the floor of bedroom . Very irritating. Why can't I put in garbage can ? But no! I have to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirror!!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my daughter in law and she loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Looks well
customer_reviews.text: Such an elegant looking mirror. Perfect size. Looks well made
customer_reviews.author: Moonstruck05

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this! It’s beautiful and solid
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It’s beautiful and solid; very well made. And image is clear— no warping at all. It’s very heavy. I had to get help to carry it upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Glass came broken. It seems like someone returned this item before. Box was used and re-taped.
customer_reviews.author: Ji

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The back piece that holds the glass in place came apart within the first week. Mind you it’s been unmoved and untouched. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: JCamp6599

customer_reviews.title: Shattered
customer_reviews.text: Completely shattered when we opened the box. Too heavy to even bother to return. Money down the drain, lesson learned don’t buy mirrors on line.
customer_reviews.author: D. T.

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute beautiful mirror and perfect size. Have it in my living room as an accent piece. Def worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check products before shipping
customer_reviews.text: It has a crack the whole side of the front.
customer_reviews.author: linda royer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! But it
customer_reviews.text: Have been searching a mirror with reasonable price for a while. Great quality! But it!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice mirror but had a chip out of the wood ...
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived damaged. It's a nice mirror but had a chip out of the wood when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Mirror came detached from frame
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews, mirror came broken. Little staples are meant to hold mirror onto frame??
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Logan

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was what we ordered but was not very well constructed. The staples holding the mirror into the frame was pulling away. I needed to glue it to hold it in.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Arrived quickly. Packaged very well. Great price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this
customer_reviews.text: Best mirror ever! It's huge, visually pleasing, no assembly. So happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived shattered. took forever to get UPS to pick it up, they did not want to carry away a box full of broken glass.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worst product I have purchase from amazon
customer_reviews.text: The worst product I have purchase from amazon!!! On delivery the back boards where broke and the mirror wood was chipped. Tried to fix the broke piece the entire back board fell off!!! This product is not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Deidra Plater

customer_reviews.title: This is nice and big and easy to adjust but it isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and big and easy to adjust but it isn't very heavy and seems a little unsturdy and as I have it on carpet whenever I reposition it I make really sure that it's stable and won't fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built product.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly built product. The mirror separates from the frame easily. It can fall and shatter abruptly.
customer_reviews.author: Amrish Raj

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for the perfect big mirror that did not break the bank and this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror!!! It is quite an addition to my bedroom. Stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bowen

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mirror and the service provided by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mirror and the service provided by Amazon. My original order was damaged in transit but they quickly sent a replacement and picked up the defective one. Sturdy and has a contemporary design. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The floor mirror arrived on time and I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JANICE REEVE

customer_reviews.title: Substantial and High Quality Full-Length Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. This mirror exceeded my expectations. It is substantial, is quite heavy (this tells me it is not cheap in my opinion), and appears to be of great quality. I expect to have it for years to come! I also love how you can adjust the angle position of this mirror. If you are looking for a stylish full length mirror and it matches your color scheme (dark chocolate brown casing) then I recommend this mirror. It was also packaged very, very well...to the point where it took me at least 30 minutes to get all of the layers of padding and wrap off of it!
customer_reviews.author: IHeartShopping

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I was a tiny bit afraid, but this mirror came in PERFECT condition. And the coloring of the frame works very well here. Also, I'm extremely grateful to the person who wrote the review warning that care was necessary when dealing with the packing material. I warned the fellows who kindly unpacked and set up this wonderful mirror for me, and there is NO extra mess to be dealt with. I'm extremely pleased with this purchase. Cheap at the price, and well beyond expectations!
customer_reviews.author: C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: The Best Floor Mirrors For The Money !!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these mirrors and the total was less than $500. We are using them as station mirrors in our salon/barbershop and we painted ours black w/ a slight gloss and they look amazing. We've already gotten so many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher De Niro

customer_reviews.title: Poorly assembled
customer_reviews.text: The shape that this mirror arrives in is pretty bad. I can understand the mirror being shattered in transit; that's obviously the fault of the carrier. But what I received is just poor quality. The mirror is completely detached from the frame because the manufacturer didn't ensure the staples were fully installed; the staples are just halfway inserted (see pictures). Every single staple is halfway in, so of course the mirror will detach in transit. That's not a shipping issue, that's a manufacturing issue. Luckily, I can fix this issue myself by properly mounting the mirror to the frame, but I shouldn't have to do that, now should I? Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, solid packing... but add on rubber feet with screw
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried similar mirrors on here that were always broken on arrival. This one was well-packed and arrived perfectly. It’s a god, solid mirror. The only suggestion that I have for fellow buyers (and this is true or any similar mirror) is to buy a pack of rubber feet that screw in (an extra $5 or so), which is good for the mirror and for the floor.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Altimore

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Ikea Larger Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped in a large Mirror. Packaged nicely. Sits really nice the corner of my room. A quality looking mirror. Buy it, you won't be disappointed. The stand behind makes it a bit more desirable than the Ikea ones with no stand that you have to lean against the wall.... I like the feature on this a whole lot more.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9" and this mirror was a necessity for me. I absolutely LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: AleciaUnique

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a mirror like this for a while, and am so glad I finally ordered one! It's beautiful, sturdy and seems to be pretty true to life (i.e., not a circus mirror!). My only issue is that one corner came a bit broken. It's too big to send back, so I'm stuck with it. Fortunately, it's a bottom corner so hopefully no one else will notice and it won't get worse. It matches my furniture beautifully and looks great in my bedroom! Overall, I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mirror for a few months now and it's beautiful. It's a nice large, heavy statement piece in my bedroom and it's great for selfies. I did have to get it shipped to me twice because the packaging it came in was cheap and damage was inevitable in transport. Note on the packaging, the foam it comes in is cheap and will get EVERYWHERE. Open with caution and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Majestic but has scratches already
customer_reviews.text: I like this mirror. It's huge and majestic. It was well packaged and easy to assemble. BUT when I got this mirror, it already had scratches and mirror marks. That was really frustrating for me because I really love the mirror. The company did offer to take it back but it was really hard for me to package it to ship out since it's a mirror and it's really big. So I have no choice but to keep the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Dymphna M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Very Sturdy/Heavy Mirror. Looks like it will be a nice addition to the home for years to come. Would highly recommend this product. Very nicely packaged and shipped!
customer_reviews.author: na

customer_reviews.title: Stylish mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase ! Very stylish and easy to clean. I located this in corridor and it gives new look to it
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is beautiful. It fits perfectly in my space. It arrived on time and in perfect condition. I absolutely love it and highly recommend buying it. It will last me forever!
customer_reviews.author: Laja We

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: I love the adjustable stand and the hooks that hold it in place. It is large and reasonably priced. I use it in front of a salon chair, and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jamalyn Fritsch

customer_reviews.title: Defective.  Mirror not attached to frame/stand.
customer_reviews.text: First mirror was defective. It was not attached to its frame. Replacement sent had identical issue. Very frustrating, but seller did provide refund, so I am ultimately satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Pop Tart

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted makes me room look nice.
customer_reviews.text: It's big enough replaces my old mirror not to heavy fits behind my door but my door doesn't ever hit the mirror part because the side prevents the door handle opening on it. Just what I wanted makes me room look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: It's ugly!
customer_reviews.text: Wait, no that's just me. It had a ding in the frame on delivery, but I think that was just the friendly local delivery man taking out his family problems on our packages again.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This almost becomes a statement piece itself in a room
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I love it but upon arrival the frame has damages at ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it but upon arrival the frame has damages at the corner. Wrapping up the box back again for returning was pretty tough.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Jung

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFULThis mirror is a spectacular piece to have in your home. It's large so you must have the room for it. Sturdy, heavy piece of furniture that you will feel proud to own
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.  Blake

customer_reviews.title: Floor Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror. The quality is pretty good and color is exactly what I expected. Just a bit larger than expected but really like the mirror. The packaging was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror cams on time and not cracked! The mirror was a little detached from the fram, but with a nail it went right back in.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic mirror! The packaging was high quality to avoid any issues while being shipped.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: SO worth the price... looks like a 300$ mirror , heavy, very nicely made. Happy i ordered this :)! CLASSY
customer_reviews.author: Romon and Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful clear mirror -perfect. Very well packaged and delivered right on time. Excellent purchase!!.
customer_reviews.author: LYNETTE FOREMAN

product_meta.title: Coaster Home Furnishings Beveled Frame Floor Mirror Dark Cappuccino
product_meta.description: Bring function and fashion to a casual space. This floor mirror delivers an ideal angle for reflection as well as a stylish décor accent. Enjoy a bold, dark cappuccino finish frame with a back support. Its beveled frame adds a dimensional effect and artistic appeal. Place this exceptional mirror in a bedroom or living area.
